comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Robert E. Williams (b. April 27, 1884) was a catcher with the New York Highlanders and New York Yankees in the American League. He was released by the Yankees in 1913 to the Rochester Club of the International League. Source: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9F05E4D91F3AE6...
